body.name: Car Steering Wheel Desk | Food Table for Car | Steering Wheel Tray for Constant Travelers, Fits Most Vehicles Steering Wheels (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 1 hr 28 mins
features: 【Comfortable and convenient】Do you often eat in the car? This car tray is light and stable, with full suspension structure and no support at the bottom of the table, so your legs can move more freely. Fixed in the steering wheel to do some work or eat fast food is very convenient, you can put the drink sauce on the tray, do not have to worry about your sauce or drink spill out to get dirty clothes.

【2-sided design】The front side of the tray table has a cup holder for cups and drinks, and a concave surface on the front to prevent food from slipping off; the reverse side is a flat surface with a pen slot for office writing and reading books. You can easily write on it or put your laptop and don't worry about losing your pen.

【Installation】Fits steering wheels with circumference ​between 4.06”-4.33,Simply hook the tray from the bottom to the steering wheel to secure it, and you have an instant desk. When you don't need it you can remove it and put it in the back seat pocket, it takes up very little space.

【Cleaning】The steering wheel table is made of high quality high-density fiberboard, which is waterproof and has a long service life. If you get it dirty, just wipe it with a paper towel or dishcloth and it will look new again.

【Service】This is the best top quality steering wheel tray that will keep your car organized and clean, we guarantee 100% satisfaction. Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions. WOZIAOWU

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Won’t fit all wheels
reviews.reviewText: I loved the product but it broke only a few weeks after purchasing. However that was most likely because I had to stretch the arms to be able to fit my wheel. But if it can fit on your wheel comfortably it’s a fantastic product. Great for eating lunch at work

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Desk or Table
reviews.reviewText: For homeschooling mothers like myself who seem to live in the car, this device is fantastic. When properly positioned, this may double as a desk or a table and is quite durable. It is inexpensive and ought to work in the majority of vehicles. Although I must reposition my seat in order toto use the workstation, doing so is simple, and once I've finished using it, I can move it back to where I need it to drive.The front of the tray table has a curved surface to stop food from slipping off and a cup holder for drinks. The tray's back side is flat and has a pen slot for use when working or reading books.I was astounded by how useful it was as I used it for the first time. The idea of setting the tray on the steering wheel is so simple yet brilliant. The desk is portable and simple to move. It easily fits between my seats when not in use. Anybody would benefit from owning this equipment because you never know when it might be useful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Might not fit all steering wheels
reviews.reviewText: For my 2014 honda civic, it fits great and i like that i can eat in my car or put my laptop on it to do work. However in my boyfriends 2014 hyundai it does not fit his steering wheel at all and now its a waste of money for him. So i would say take your chances and get it, and if it doesnt fit you wheel, return it or give it to a friend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Did not fit at first-updated reveiw
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted this to work but it did not fit my cars steering wheel. Reading other reviews I knew that it was possible it wouldn't fit but I rolled the dice anyway. It is sturdy enough to hold a lap top or lunch so if it fits it will work. There needs to be better measurements in the description for this. I have a 2013 Lexus ES 350 with the standard steering wheel and no cover on it. This tray looks like its made for a much smaller steering wheel.Update: In an effort to find one of these that would fit I found another that showed it must be installed with the steering wheel upside down. I tried that on this one and it worked so I am able to use it now. I raised it from 1 to 3 stars. It is a tad flimsy but it works ok. You can not put a drink on it if you do not have the steering wheel locked but since I wanted to leave my car running I just put it in the middle and it was fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Table/ desk for vehicle
reviews.reviewText: I'll be honest, I thought this item was going to be a cheap gadget that would not work but to my surprise it works perfectly. I have used it with my laptop for work and have also used to have a meal while running errands. It is the best gift I could have given myself since I'm always on the go. Very recommended for anyone that is constantly in the car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Steering wheel tray table
reviews.reviewText: Took me a second to figure out how to get it on my steering wheel, but once I did I was skeptical that it wasn’t going to be sturdy enough. To my surprise it held up perfectly for my lunch break. Was able to eat and get a little bit of work done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not as big as you think
reviews.reviewText: Unfortunately the desk isnt as big as it looks and the cutout of the plastic material isnt a clean cut, so it will scratch your car up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars If it doesn't fit your steering wheel, turn it upside down.
reviews.reviewText: I thought it didnt fit my steering wheel, but then I read the directions and just had to turn my steering wheel upside down! Fit perfectly. It is a bit flimsy if you put your full weight on it or a heavier model laptop like a 15" HP Laptop. My iPad sat on it fine. Excited to enjoy more take out in my car!
